languages.text: "Ну как сказать — я мутант с рождения", {n} — Ханн улыбается, мрачно и устало.{/n} "Навигаторы приучены сопротивляться влиянию Хаоса, и я сопротивлялся как мог. Но буду честен — я не могу быть уверен, что полностью избежал его. Пока видимых проявлений нет. Пока".

"Well, that depends — I was born a mutant, you see." {n}Hann smiles, grimly and wearily.{/n} "Navigators are taught to resist the influence of Chaos, and so I have been, as best I could. But I will be frank with you — I cannot be certain that I have avoided it completely. There have been no visible indications. Yet."
languages.original_text: "Ну как сказать — я мутант с рождения", {n} — Ханн улыбается, мрачно и устало.{/n} "Навигаторы приучены сопротивляться влиянию Хаоса, и я сопротивлялся как мог. Но буду честен — я не могу быть уверен, что полностью избежал его. Пока видимых проявлений нет. Пока".

But I will be frank with you — I cannot be certain that I have avoided it completely. There have been no visible indications. Yet."

But I will be frank with you — I cannot be certain that I have avoided it completely. There have been no visible indications. Yet."

But I will be frank with you — I cannot be certain that I have avoided it completely. There have been no visible indications. Yet."

languages.text: 「なんとも言えません。私は変異体として生まれたので」{n}ハンは不愉快そうに、疲労混じりに微笑んだ。{/n}「航宙士は渾沌の影響に抗うように訓練されているので、できる限り抵抗しました。ですが、正直なところ完全に影響を受けていないと自信を持っては言えません。今のところ目に見える兆候が出ていないだけかもしれないのです」
languages.original_text: "Well, that depends — I was born a mutant, you see." {n}Hann smiles, grimly and wearily.{/n} "Navigators are taught to resist the influence of Chaos, and so I have been, as best I could. But I will be frank with you — I cannot be certain that I have avoided it completely. There have been no visible indications. Yet."

traits.locale_text: 「なんとも言えません。私は変異体として生まれたので」{n}ハンは不愉快そうに、疲労混じりに微笑んだ。{/n}「航宙士は渾沌の影響に抗うように訓練されているので、できる限り抵抗しました。ですが、正直なところ完全に影響を受けていないと自信を持っては言えません。今のところ目に見える兆候が出ていないだけかもしれないのです」

languages.text: “嗯，这得看情况。如您所知，我生来就是个变种人。”{n}汉恩微笑道，神情严肃而疲惫。{/n}“所有导航者都接受过教导，了解如何抵抗混沌的影响。我已经尽我所能了，但我得坦率地告诉您，我无法肯定我完全抵抗住了混沌的影响。不过，目前还没有明显的迹象，暂时没有。”
languages.original_text: "Well, that depends — I was born a mutant, you see." {n}Hann smiles, grimly and wearily.{/n} "Navigators are taught to resist the influence of Chaos, and so I have been, as best I could. But I will be frank with you — I cannot be certain that I have avoided it completely. There have been no visible indications. Yet."

traits.locale_text: “嗯，着得看情况。如您所知，我生来就是个变种人。”{n}汉恩微笑道，神情严肃而疲惫。{/n}“所有导航者都接受过教导，了解如何抵抗混沌的影响。我已经尽我所能了，但我得坦率地告诉您，我无法肯定我完全抵抗住了混沌的影响。不过，目前还没有明显的迹象，暂时没有。”

languages.text: «Bueno, eso depende. Verá, nací siendo mutante». {n}Hann sonríe, sombrío y cansado.{/n} «A los Navegantes nos enseñan a resistir el influjo del Caos y eso he estado haciendo en la medida de lo posible. Pero debo serle sincero: no puedo estar seguro de haberlo evitado por completo. No se han producido cambios visibles. Por ahora».
languages.original_text: "Well, that depends — I was born a mutant, you see." {n}Hann smiles, grimly and wearily.{/n} "Navigators are taught to resist the influence of Chaos, and so I have been, as best I could. But I will be frank with you — I cannot be certain that I have avoided it completely. There have been no visible indications. Yet."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, eso depende. Verá, nací siendo mutante». {n}Hann sonríe, sombrío y cansado.{/n} «A los Navegantes nos enseñan a resistir el influjo del Caos y eso he estado haciendo en la medida de lo posible. Pero debo serle sincero: no puedo estar seguro de haberlo evitado por completo. No se han producido cambios visibles. Por ahora».

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas aussi simple que ça ; je suis mutant de naissance, voyez-vous, {n}dit-il avec un sourire sombre et las.{/n} On enseigne aux navigateurs à résister à l'influence du Chaos, c'est donc ce que je fais, du mieux que je le peux. Mais en toute franchise, je ne peux pas affirmer avec certitude y avoir entièrement réchappé. Je sais simplement que je ne présente aucun symptôme... pour le moment. »
languages.original_text: "Well, that depends — I was born a mutant, you see." {n}Hann smiles, grimly and wearily.{/n} "Navigators are taught to resist the influence of Chaos, and so I have been, as best I could. But I will be frank with you — I cannot be certain that I have avoided it completely. There have been no visible indications. Yet."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas aussi simple que ça ; je suis mutant de naissance, voyez-vous, {n}dit-il avec un sourire sombre et las.{/n} On enseigne aux navigateurs à résister à l'influence du Chaos, c'est donc ce que je fais, du mieux que je le peux. Mais en toute franchise, je ne peux pas affirmer avec certitude y avoir entièrement réchappé. Je sais simplement que je ne présente aucun symptôme... pour le moment. »

languages.text: "Na ja, wie man's nimmt – ich wurde als Mutant geboren, wisst Ihr." {n}Hann lächelt grimmig und erschöpft.{/n} "Navigatoren lernen, dem Einfluss des Chaos zu widerstehen, und das habe ich getan, so gut ich konnte. Aber ich will offen mit Euch sein – ich kann nicht garantieren, dass ich ihm komplett entgangen bin. Sichtbare Anzeichen gab es allerdings nicht. Noch nicht."
languages.original_text: "Well, that depends — I was born a mutant, you see." {n}Hann smiles, grimly and wearily.{/n} "Navigators are taught to resist the influence of Chaos, and so I have been, as best I could. But I will be frank with you — I cannot be certain that I have avoided it completely. There have been no visible indications. Yet."

traits.locale_text: "Na ja, wie man's nimmt – ich wurde als Mutant geboren, wisst Ihr." {n}Hann lächelt grimmig und erschöpft.{/n} "Navigatoren lernen, dem Einfluss des Chaos zu widerstehen, und das habe ich getan, so gut ich konnte. Aber ich will offen mit Euch sein – ich kann nicht garantieren, dass ich ihm komplett entgangen bin. Sichtbare Abzeichen gab es allerdings nicht. Noch nicht."

languages.text: "Nereden baktığınıza göre değişir. Ben doğuştan mutantım." {n}Hann, nahoş ve yorgun bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Rotacılara Kaos'un etkisine direnmeleri öğretilir. Ben de elimden geldiğince direndim ama sizinle açık konuşayım, tamamen kaçınabildiğimden emin olmam mümkün değil. En azından görünür bir etkisi olmadı. Henüz yani."
languages.original_text: "Well, that depends — I was born a mutant, you see." {n}Hann smiles, grimly and wearily.{/n} "Navigators are taught to resist the influence of Chaos, and so I have been, as best I could. But I will be frank with you — I cannot be certain that I have avoided it completely. There have been no visible indications. Yet."

traits.locale_text: "Nereden baktığınıza göre değişir. Ben doğuştan mutantım." {n}Hann nahoş ve yorgun bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Rotacılara Kaos'un etkisine direnmeleri öğretilir ve ben de elimden geldiğince direndim ama sizinle açık konuşayım; tamamen kaçınabildiğimden emin olmam mümkün değil. En azından görünür bir etkisi olmadı. Henüz."
